description:
While attracting customers for a cabaret club, Madao, a completely hopeless man, is hospitalized after being hit by a runaway car. After his repeated misfortunes, what saved the dispirited Hasegawa was Miss Uchino and her devoted caring. Wanting to somehow show his appreciation before leaving the hospital, Hasegawa notices that Uchino has been acting odd the past several days. It seems she has fallen in love with one of her patients. With some help from Gintoki and the gang, who are hospitalized in the same room after some food poisoning, Hasegawa attempts to help Uchino’s love succeed, but…
Source: crunchyroll
